name: Menagerie Street
description:
... Nothing stays hidden in this neighborhood long...

Menagerie Street is an interactive mystery in which you can immerse yourself in a unique suburban world filled with quirky, secretive neighbors.

You are a humble hobby gardener who wakes to find their crops stolen. Will you recover your ludumberries in time for the Harvest Festival? And what will you uncover in your wake?

TEAM 

This game was created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 52 game jam by the following team: 

Evan Charfauros - Programmer, Project Leader

Ang - Director, Lead Writer

Tangent - Artist, Visual Designer

Cat - Sound Designer, Writer

CONTENT WARNINGS:
Mention of adult themes, alcohol/alcoholism, profanity

CONTROLS: 

Select: Mouse or Trackpad. 

Advance: Space or Click. 

Accuse: Go to your own house and mull over your clues.

Thanks for playing! May your ludumberry harvest be plentiful.
